p: This assay determined the ability of the obtained leaf extracts to reduce the intracellular levels of ROS in HeLa, Jurkat, T24, and MCF-7 cancer cells. The assay employs the fluorogenic dye (H 2DCF-DA) [ 35]. The cancer cells were exposed to leaf extracts or polyphenols IC 50 values (determined by DPPH). DCF fluorescence was determined after 90 min of treatment at 485 nm. Hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2) was used as a positive control.
